meaningMnemonic: When a <radical>sheep</radical> tries its hoof at <radical>construction</radical>, it gains <kanji>distinction</kanji>. Now that is something that really sets a sheep apart! After all, have you ever seen a sheep working in construction?
readingMnemonic: The extra <kanji>distinction</kanji> of this sheep is that its really skilled with a <reading>saw</reading> (さ). That's why it's so good at construction.
